name: Hidden Objects Games: free crime case investigation game
name_original: Hidden Objects Games: free crime case investigation game
description:
criminal case is game to solved puzzle and find the criminal. are you ready to solved hidden crime case and prove your self for master mind?.
in criminal case game police also help to you.
list of features:
- find the evidence from all hidden objects and guess the criminal
- police punished criminal when arrived police case.
- solve hidden crimes
- share with you friends.
